about_the_game:
Play as a mischievous ghost in Good Soup, a cozy point-and-click adventure that mixes humor, heart, and haunting surprises!

Follow Amber, a self-described "girlfailure" culinary student, as she stumbles through her daily routine. Your job? Interact with her world to nudge her life in unexpected directions. Improve her day, make her life harder, change her future—or simply give her a good scare!

Key Features:

  • Be the Ghost: Haunt Amber’s life in creative ways by meddling with her surroundings and influencing her decisions.

  • Passive Storytelling: Dive deeper into Amber's world by exploring the objects literred around her apartment, packed narratives about her life and struggles.

  • Branching Outcomes: Every action leads to a cascade of effects, altering Amber’s behavior and unlocking one of many unique endings.

Are you the friendly ghost she needs, the troublemaker she dreads, or something in between? The choice is yours in Good Soup!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-2100 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 260X (or equivalent with 2 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 300 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: A keyboard and mouse are required.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10/11 (64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8400 / AMD Ryzen 3 3300X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 580 (or equivalent with 4 GB VRAM)
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: A keyboard and mouse are required.
